attributes.action: Stop the introduction of blasphemy laws in the uk
attributes.additional_details: We ask the Government to respect and uphold the principles of freedom and fairness, ensuring that no single group imposes its beliefs on the majority. The strength of a pluralistic society lies in its ability to accommodate a multitude of voices and perspectives while maintaining respect for individual rights and freedoms.
attributes.background: Not to introduce any blasphemy law in the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
The Government have said that they are not going to introduce blasphemy laws:
